# Reading Phylogenies

This lecture module introduces how to interpret phylogenetic trees and basic phylogenetic concepts.

**Learning Objectives**

1. Learn what a phylogeny is.
1. Understand how to identify most recent common ancestor between taxa.
1. Learn how to interpret phylogenetic topologies and relationships.
